us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces

Interface LineSegment3DBasics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable, LineSegment3DReadOnly, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FixedFrameLineSegment3DBasics, FrameLineSegment3DBasics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FrameLineSegment3D, LineSegment3D

    public interface LineSegment3DBasics
extends LineSegment3DReadOnly, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable, us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Transformable
    Write and read interface for a line segment 3D.

    A line segment 3D is a finite-length line defined in the XY-plane by its two 3D endpoints.

    • Method Summary

        Tests if this line segment contains Double.NaN.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • setToZero

        default void setToZero()
        Sets both endpoints of this line segment to zero.
        Specified by:

      • setToNaN

        default void setToNaN()
        Sets both endpoints of this line segment to Double.NaN. After calling this method, this line segment becomes invalid. A new pair of valid endpoints will have to be set so this line segment is again usable.
        Specified by:
        setToNaN in interface us.ihmc.euclid.interfaces.Clearable

        Changes the first endpoint of this line segment.
        Parameters:
        firstEndpointX - x-coordinate of the new first endpoint.
        firstEndpointY - y-coordinate of the new first endpoint.
        firstEndpointZ - z-coordinate of the new first endpoint.

      • flipDirection

        default void flipDirection()
        Swaps this line segment's endpoints.

      • translate

        default void translate(double x,
                       double y,
                       double z)
        Translates this line segment by the given (x, y, z).

        Note that the length and direction of this line segment remains unchanged.

        Parameters:
        x - the distance to translate this line along the x-axis.
        y - the distance to translate this line along the y-axis.
        z - the distance to translate this line along the z-axis.

      • translate

        default void translate(us.ihmc.euclid.tuple3D.interfaces.Tuple3DReadOnly translation)
        Translates this line segment by the given (x, y, z) contained in translation.

        Note that the length and direction of this line segment remains unchanged.

        Parameters:
        translation - the translation to add to each endpoint of this line segment. Not modified.
